title: Afghan soil should not be used for anti-India activities, terrorism: India to Taliban in first formal contact
content:
1. Afghan soil should not be used for anti-India activities, terrorism: India to Taliban in first formal contact  The Tribune India
  2. India holds talks with Taliban in Qatar's capital Doha | Afghanistan News | World | WION  WION
  3. In Afghanistan, Qatar's Taliban relations prove crucial after US withdrawal  The Washington Post
  4. Media interest in conflict zones should move beyond reporting events to understanding processes, seeking resolution  The Indian Express
  5. I fear for my family in Kabul, but I know the Taliban can be resisted  The Guardian
